rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible entrance with a low threshold and ramp leading to the main area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room designed in Bohemian style with eclectic decor; adjacent to dining area.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space within the living area for an open-plan feel.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with accessible design and ample storage; includes wheelchair-accessible counters.

rooms.name: WC
rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible bathroom with grab bars and proper clearance.

openings.description: Large window for natural light and ventilation, following Vastu guidelines.

openings.location: Adjacent to living room and dining area

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Bohemian-themed master bedroom with a spacious balcony for fresh air and sunlight; includes wheelchair-accessible interior layout.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Guest bedroom designed in Bohemian style with natural textures and a balcony for ventilation.

rooms.name: Shared Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible bathroom shared between bedrooms with grab bars installed.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Spacious rooftop terrace designed as a communal area with seating and greenery; includes safety railings and accessible ramp.

rooms.name: Storage/Utility Room
rooms.description: Functional storage space integrated into the design for efficiency on a tight budget.

openings.description: Limited balcony providing outdoor air circulation.
